verse0: Early in the morning we'll be startin' out
Some honeys will be coming along
And headin' out singing our song
verse1: At Rincon they're walking the nose
We're going on safari to the islands this year
So if you're coming get ready to go
verse2: They're anglin' in Laguna in Cerro Azul
They're kicking out in Doheny too
I tell you surfing's mighty wild
From Hawaii to the shores of Peru
verse3: Come on and safari with me
